  16. open Asttypes
  17. open Parsetree

  19. ‌type error =
  20.   | Multiple_attributes of string
  21.   | No_payload_expected of string

  23. exception Error of Location.t * error

  25. ‌let get_no_payload_attribute alt_names attrs =
  26.   match List.filter (fun a -> List.mem a.attr_name.txt alt_names) attrs with
  27.   | [] -> None
  28.   | [ {attr_name = name; attr_payload = PStr []; attr_loc = _} ] -> Some name
  29.   | [ {attr_name = name; _} ] ->
  30.     raise (Error (name.loc, No_payload_expected name.txt))
  31.   | _ :: {attr_name = name; _} :: _ ->
  32.     raise (Error (name.loc, Multiple_attributes name.txt))

  34. ‌let has_no_payload_attribute alt_names attrs =
  35.   match get_no_payload_attribute alt_names attrs with
  36.   | None   -> false
  37.   | Some _ -> true

  39. open Format

  41. ‌let report_error ppf = function
  42.   | Multiple_attributes name ->
  43.     fprintf ppf "Too many `%s' attributes" name
  44.   | No_payload_expected name ->
  45.     fprintf ppf "Attribute `%s' does not accept a payload" name

  47. let () =
  48.   Location.register_error_of_exn
  49.     (function
  50.       | Error (loc, err) ->
  51.         Some (Location.error_of_printer ~loc report_error err)
  52.       | _ ->
  53.         None
  54.     )
